resources.string: Welcome to Chordier! \n This app is designed to help musicians and song writers with the sometimes difficult task of creating chord progressions. Chordier currently provides two services: a chord progression builder, and a melody builder. These can work for all major and minor keys and all diatonic chords.

Chord Progression Builder \n Here you can create your own chord progression. Click the plus button to add a new chord and start writing. If you get stuck or would like some assistance, click the bottom of the screen to filter the best chords specific to your own progression.

Melody Builder \n Here you can generate chord progressions to support your melodies. Use the grid to punch in your melody. Each column counts for one sixteenth note. To help, beats are counted for you below. Empty columns are treated as rests and sustained notes can be represented by selecting strings of the same note.
